'''0.0.21a'''<ref name="release"/><ref name="yt">{{ytl|iMJDvkHgnxU|minecrafting|Lil fimbul|June 23, 2009}}</ref> is a version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released on June 22, 2009,<ref name="blog">[[wordofnotch:128292167|"New client, fixes a few annoyances"]] – The Word of Notch, June 22, 2009</ref> at 19:52 UTC.<ref name="release">[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P2:52:16 <Notch> 0.0.21a is up, fixing the long standing picking bug''" (19:52:16 UTC)</ref> This version is not available in the launcher, but its reupload has been archived elsewhere.

0.0.21a was reuploaded<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P3:12:15 <peerkoel> hm, client version is still 0.0.21a?''" (20:12:15 UTC)</ref> at 20:08 UTC (16 minutes after release) to re-add the ability to auto-click.<ref name="reupload">[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P3:09:13 <Notch> client is updated again''" [...] "''P3:10:20 <Notch> does autoclick work now?''" (20:09:13 to 20:10:20 UTC)</ref>

== Changes ==
[[File:Blocks0021a.png|thumb|All of the blocks in this version.]]
=== Blocks ===
'''{{Animate|Oak Sapling JE2.png;Dandelion JE1.png;Rose JE1.png;Red Mushroom JE1.png;Brown Mushroom JE1.png|32px}} [[Plants]]'''
* If a plant is in the shade, then selected, its sprite will vanish.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P3:13:23 <vdgmprgrmr> I noticed that, if any plant is in the shade, and you move your cursor over it while in delete mode, a transparent white box will appear like normal, but the actual plant sprites will vanish.''" (20:12:23 UTC)</ref>

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Inventory]]'''
* Now has a gray background.<ref name="yt"/>
* It is now possible to walk and change slots while in the inventory.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P2:52:22 <Notch> also, new B-menu''", "''P2:52:28 <Notch> you can walk and change slot with it up now''" (19:52 UTC)</ref>

'''[[Controls]]'''
* Auto-clicking now works again.<ref name="reupload"/>
* Build distance was increased.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P3:12:45 <AlLnAtuRalX> Notch, thanks for increasing build distance''" (20:12:45 UTC)</ref>

=== General ===
'''[[Menu screen]]s'''
[[File:Generation in 0.0.21a.jpg|thumb|179x179px|The generation in this version.]]
* "Carving" section of world generation has been changed slightly, causing the world to take longer to generate.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P2:54:48 <greenslimy> Notch, Im on single player and generating a map is so slow >.>''" [...] "''P2:57:04 <Notch> carving changed a bit''" (19:54:48 & 19:57:04 UTC)</ref>

== Technical ==
=== Performance ===
* Higher FPS on some computers.<ref name="blog"/>

== Fixes ==
'''3 bugs fixed'''
* Fixed a bug that caused the game to be impossible to play on MacBook.<ref name="blog"/>
* <!-- [[Controls#Configurable controls|Picking]] should work everywhere. -->Fixed a bug with OpenGL picking.<ref name="release"/><ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P2:58:28 <peerkoel> Notch: what exactly was the picking bug?''" [...] ''P2:58:40 <Notch> opengl picking wasn't working right on some cards''" (19:58 UTC)</ref>
** Changed to using raycasting.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P2:58:54 <Notch> so I changed it to a pure software implementation (raycasting)''", "''P2:58:57 <Notch> it's also ten times faster, heh''" (19:58 UTC)</ref>
* Fixed a problem with not being able to highlight blocks.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: ''P4:05:10 <Haruhi2> I fixed the problem''" [...] "''P4:05:17 <Haruhi2> with not being able to highlight''" [...] "''P4:05:41 <Notch> actually, 0.0.21a fixes it at well''" [...] "''P4:05:51 <Notch> all highlighting is done is software now. =)''" (21:05 UTC)</ref>

== Bugs ==
'''2 bugs reported'''
* Pre-reupload: Mouse auto-clicking no longer works.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P3:00:13 <PuyoDead> no auto click is killing me already''" (20:00:13 UTC)</ref>
* Reupload: Introduced a hang bug, causing the game to freeze randomly, requiring a relaunch to resolve.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P3:53:52 <flak> minecraft keeps randomly hanging my furryfaux''", "''P3:53:56 <Maulrus> same''", "''P3:54:05 <vdgmprgrmr> Same as flak.''" [...] "''P3:54:20 <Maulrus> minecraft crashes it and I have to close the tab quickly when I restart it or it'll freeze it again''", "''P3:54:23 <Maulrus> but not often''", "''P3:54:24 <vdgmprgrmr> But it happens pretty rarely...''" [...] "''P3:55:15 <ZomBuster> it randomly freezes''" (20:53:52 to 20:55:15 UTC)</ref>
